message: Looks don't matter these days! Be respectful!!! Someone next to you could be short in height, takes great care of their skin to look youthful. But they are older than you think! It's the way God made them! Don't judge!

you are 100% right

Katie, I am on a long car ride and I just read some people's ignorant comments. Try not to take them personally. I have a horrible chronic physical illness and sometimes to help me through it I just read the comments on news feed and laugh. I think to myself how the hell can some people be so ignorant and judgemental? Lol. Sometimes I will comment, just to try to educate

We had every console going. My father was just as interested in this new technology as we were. I'm artistic - was well able to entertain myself as a child - & had to be dragged in from climbing trees, when it was raining. I wouldn't say I turned out fantastic, but I'm alright. Was the same fear mongering not there when the T.V. first came along? Besides, kids have to be tech savvy these days, otherwise they will get left behind in the future & have less opportunities available to them. Learning to code is akin to learning a language.
